      • onSaveAddPart

        public void onSaveAddPart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        FUTURE ENHANCEMENT: Add an add another part button if the user wants to add more than one part. If they want to add another part, save current part and display a blank add part form. When the user clicks save, generate a random ID number, handle exceptions, and add the new part to the parts table. Save the new part to inventory.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
